        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358044">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358044">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358044">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21358044" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21358045">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358045">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358045">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358045">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21358045" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21358470">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358470">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358470">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358470">
          <div id="boxatt21358470" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24863977">
              <a id="link_24863977" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/869488612?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24863977,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24863977}); ">
               The American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (via library subscription)
               <br />
               Preferred source for American English definitions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24864227">
              <a id="link_24864227" href="http://www.opensourceshakespeare.org/concordance/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24864227,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24864227}); ">
               Concordance of Shakepeare's Works
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24863507">
              <a id="link_24863507" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/acref/9780199829941.001.0001/acref-9780199829941" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24863507,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24863507}); ">
               Green's Dictionary of Slang
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Via library subscription.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24861489">
              <a id="link_24861489" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oed.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861489,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20417751}); ">
               OED Online (Oxford English Dictionary)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (via library subscription)
               <br />
               The premier source for history of words in the English language, available via library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24937935">
              <a id="link_24937935" href="http://www.bartleby.com/quotations/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24937935,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24937935}); ">
               Quotations at Bartleby
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A freely available collection of quotation books from Bartleby.com.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24861494">
              <a id="link_24861494" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/231683956?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861494,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24861494}); ">
               Word Origins: The Hidden Histories of English Words from A to Z
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (via library subscription)
               <br />
               The origins of thousands of words in the English language explored and explained.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Orwell's works online
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358504">
          <div id="boxatt21358504" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24861544">
              <a id="link_24861544" href="https://ebooks.adelaide.edu.au/o/orwell/george/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861544,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24861544}); ">
               ebooks@Adelaide: George Orwell
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               E-texts from the University of Adelaide, Australia. To the best of our knowledge, the texts of these works are in the “Public Domain” in Australia. Copyright law varies in other countries, and the work may still be under copyright in the country from which you are accessing this website. It is your responsibility to check the applicable copyright laws in your country before downloading this work. These works are most likely not in the public domain in the United States.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21358538">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358538">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358538">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Titles by Orwell, and titles about Orwell and his work, in hard copy and/or online
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358538">
          <div id="boxatt21358538" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24863514">
              <a id="link_24863514" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24863514,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24863514}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Tips for using Encompass Search for this assignment:
               <br />
               Run a SUBJECT search on either of these phrases: George Orwell or George Orwell language
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21358048">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358048">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358048">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358048">
          <div id="boxatt21358048" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24861029">
              <a id="link_24861029" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861029,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24861030">
              <a id="link_24861030" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861030,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24861031">
              <a id="link_24861031" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861031,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618824}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Recent archive of journals from a number of academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24863508">
              <a id="link_24863508" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24863508,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21358049">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358049">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358049">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358049">
          <div id="boxatt21358049" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24861032">
              <a id="link_24861032" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861032,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24861033">
              <a id="link_24861033" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24861033,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'George Orwell', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5674526" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21358050">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358050">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358050">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358050">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21358050" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21358051">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21358051">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21358051">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21358051">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21358051" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
